squeeze
more.

Move faster, think better, sleep more. Want to change your life and improve healthy lifestyle? Good, but rememeber - there is no turning back from here. Get your GYM LEMON monthly pass today and make your life better.

01 catherine brook

gym lemon lift weight trainer

Photo by: Steven Williams

are you ready for real change in your life?

You know that feeling: wake up, brush teeth, drink coffee, take your children to school, get to the office, do your job. You arriving to home and feel exhausted. Your body is tired, your ability to think - low. And the worse thing is the next day will look the same. Nightmare, isn't it?

But you can change it. The key is healthy lifestyle: take care of your body, mind, self-discipline. In GYM LEMON we focus on your results. If you'd like to take this challenge with professional team - check our offer and contact us!

catherine
brook

lift weight & cardio trainings

Cathy is a weightlifter, five time World Champion and eight time European Champion competing in the +90 kg and +75 kg categories until 2018 and +87 kg starting in 2018 after the International Weightlifting Federation reorganized the categories. Cathy won the world championship five times (2010, 2013, 2014, 2015, and 2018) in the +75kg and +87kg categories.

Eddy
Caufield

crossfit & box trainings

Eddy has been a head coach at Carousel CrossFit since 2011, when the gym first began. After several years of bouncing around different gyms, trying different ventures, like triathlons and marathons, Eddy was introduced to CrossFit by his wife Andrea, and was immediately hooked. He started coaching CrossFit in 2009 after he first earned his L1 and Olympic Lifting certifications.

ruth
williams

yoga & pilates classes

A current psychology student at Monash University, Melbourne. Ruth moved to London to begin GYM LEMON trainer in 2014. She practising and learning yoga for the past 6 years. Ruth is passionate about energetic connection, meditation, philosophy discussion, self-journey, trauma-specific yoga, and healin practices. Ruth guides students through their yoga training course.
